content: Judgment on Jerusalem and the Nations
She listens to no voice;
She does not trust in the ;
The Conversion of the Nations
“For at that time I will change the speech of the peoples
that all of them may call upon the name of the
From beyond the rivers of Cush
Israel's Joy and Restoration
Sing aloud, O daughter of Zion;
Rejoice and exult with all your heart,
The  has taken away the judgments against you;
The King of Israel, the , is in your midst;
On that day it shall be said to Jerusalem:
“Fear not, O Zion;
The  your God is in your midst,
he will rejoice over you with gladness;
he will exult over you with loud singing.
I will gather those of you who mourn for the festival,
Behold, at that time I will deal
And I will save the lame
and I will change their shame into praise
At that time I will bring you in,
for I will make you renowned and praised
when I restore your fortunes
